entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
